overview:
David Spiro is a BBA at the University of Michigan Business School, and he is in charge of the Product Vision and Financing at Thru.im.

David was recruited to Michigan on a baseball scholarship, but has turned into an entrepreneur since rupturing his spleen two years ago. From his days as a ballplayer, David learned how to dream big, make strategic decisions, and lead a team of skilled individuals. Last year, he wrote the business plan for Ann Arbor’s 4th generation bike sharing system (http://bit.ly/aY2hpr). He previously worked for Merrill Lynch and The Related Companies as a summer intern, and was the only undergraduate in a program of graduates and older. Before working on Thru.im, David helped build an instant messaging application: http://squaared.im.
